episodesJson.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967, part one
episodesJson.description: This program, the first of six, explores the Senate Hearings on Public Broadcasting Act of 1967. Highlighted testimony before the U.S. Senate Commerce Subcommittee on Communications, chaired by Senator John Pastore.

creator.name: National Association of Educational Broadcasters, WAMU-FM (Radio station : Washington, D.C.)
